Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the authority for the impose an additional mortgage recording tax in Otsego county
Summary: Extends the authority for the county of Otsego to impose an additional mortgage recording tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 374 of the laws of 2024 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Otsego to impose an additional mortgage recording tax, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
